name: Google Chrome Bookmark Fixer
description: This extension helps you browse and restore your Chrome extensions from your system .BAK file.

browser_action.default_title: Get started restoring your Google Chrome bookmarks from .BAK

content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://storage.googleapis.com https://ssl.google-analytics.com https://apis.google.com https://fonts.googleapis.com https://connect.facebook.net https://graph.facebook.com 'sha256-poVMD5VXXWcALHrxui2J+42/kq0w/CwJ/IlAo8RfQYg='; object-src 'self'
